channel.title: [REQ] Script for login page with encrypted password
channel.description: I need one for my site, please. I need it in either, HTML or Java. Right now my website is stuck with a simple java password which doesn't help at all, since people can just view the page source and get the password.

item.title: [REQ] Script for login page with encrypted password
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[quote=“Duncan, post:5, topic:3236”]I would switch hosting then… :rolleyes:

http://www.homingnetwork.com <— Great deals.[/quote]

To tell you the truth, I’m using geocities right now.
It’s because I can’t afford any hosting right now. Also, I don’t have any bank account or any of that sort to get my money online. PLUS, I haven’t had any work in a while.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Script for login page with encrypted password
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

I would definately not recommend just using javascript, but if its your only option, I would look into this script: http://www.codingforums.com/showthread.php?s=&threadid=10114

It’s the best and most secure javascript login script I’ve ever seen actually.

[off topic]It’s been a long time since I was active on that forum…going through my old posts now, I was totally cluless back then :D[/off topic]

Read full topic
